slide.title: My Projects

about.title: About me
about.description: I am a web developer and I am passionate about code and graphic design.

project_1.title: Visuals AQLM 3.5
project_1.text: I was brought to realize the visuals of the site leak.aqlm.fr of the Start-Up AQLM 3.5. For this, I used the Adobe Illustrator software that I use in self-taught for 3 years. They have been created entirely vectorial

project_2.title: Help-Center AQLM 3.5
project_2.text: AQLM 3.5 is a Start-Up offering SEO, web development and cybersecurity services. I had the pleasure to realize their Help-Center page of their website leak.aqlm.fr

project_3.title: Logo + Visuals Green Valley
project_3.text: Green Valley Disc Golf is a disc golf association located in Haute-Savoie. The association contacted me to create their logo. Happy with my work, I created other visuals on their behalf. The visuals are visible on their Facebook page

project_4.title: Print Super U
project_4.text: 2/3 Lab butcher, 1/3 Graphist Marketing. 6 months during which I realized some leaflets and logo in PDF format for the Super U of L'Arbresle country

project_5.title: Single Page CV
project_5.text: A small Single Page of my Curriculum Vitae created in React.js and Redux in order to learn this one in autodidact. It is no longer updated and is not responsive
